AI Description: CPE-CUDA is a software tool designed for parallelizing and optimizing Computational Pipeline Engines (CPE) using CUDA (Compute Unified Device Architecture). It aims to accelerate the execution of CPE workflows by leveraging the parallel processing power of NVIDIA GPUs.
Core Features: Parallelizing Computational Pipeline Engines, Optimizing Workflows Using Cuda, Utilizing Nvidia Gpus For Acceleration
General Tags: Parallel Computing, Optimization, Gpu Acceleration, Workflow Management
